name: Lost In Tokyo
description:
Lost in Tokyo was made for Winter Jam 2021 (Uruguay)

*Control your character with arrow keys

*use up arrow key to interact with switches and doors.

Plot: 

You are a hikikomori character that doesn't want to go out of his home, however your friends invited you to have a nice time outside; for once you decide to listen to them and step inside the city.

What puzzle await you in the shadows of the night?

Be courageous, step outside and find out!
